page.title: 15Farming ( General )
page.content: We have done a land use survey of our area.We found out that most of the farms had orchards in them even when they grew grain products and hops. The crops grown include wheat,grass, oats,winter and spring barley,hops, various vegetables and in one field south of the Medway rape. Most farms specialise in one main crop except for the Hadlow College Farms.These grow lots of products to show the students how to grow them. Our area used to be a very important hop growing area,but now only a few fields have hops in them.The area has been known for its fruit for a long time and still produces a variety and quantity of fruit. The farm I visited grew a lot of grass to turn into silage.
